segments.text: The kitchen has a sink on the right with water running from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's filling the basin and spilling over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands in front, holding a plate and a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's facing away, focused on drying the dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming on the floor near her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, cabinets are open with a cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is on a step stool reaching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks a bit unsteady under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands nearby, arm extended toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window above the sink shows a garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything seems like a typical day, almost.
segments.speaker: PAR
